meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inevitable.
meanings.sent1: The inevitability of the sunrise brings comfort each morning.
meanings.sent2: The inevitability of aging is a natural part of life.
meanings.sent3: The inevitability of a cat chasing a laser pointer never fails to amuse.
meanings.sent4: The inevitability of change is like a river that never stops flowing.
meanings.sent5: The inevitability of winter's arrival is as sure as the changing leaves in fall.

meanings.definition: Something that is certain to happen.
meanings.sent1: We accepted the inevitability of the storm and prepared accordingly.
meanings.sent2: The inevitability of death is a universal truth that we all face.
meanings.sent3: The inevitability of a squirrel stealing birdseed always makes us chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The inevitability of time passing is like a relentless march forward.
meanings.sent5: The inevitability of a flower blooming is a beautiful sight in spring.
